General.Name: VIA Technologies Inc
General.Description: VIA Technologies, Inc. engage in the programming, designing, manufacturing, and sale of semiconductors and PC chip sets. It provides AI dash cameras, video telematic systems, forklift safety systems, heavy equipment safety systems, mining safety kits, and Mobile360 Series systems; AMOS series systems, ARTiGO series systems, ALTA DS series signage players, and IVT01 android tablets; embedded boards and modules, and developer and starter kits; accessories comprising power boards and wireless accessories; and silicon processors and chipsets. The company also offers transportation solutions, such as taxis and ride sharing, commercial deliveries, heavy vehicles, last mile, law enforcement, trucking and haulage, and logistics and warehouse services; industrial solutions, including visual inspection, safety inspection, and industrial automation solutions, as well as machine vision platform and energy management system; and smart city solutions comprising smart residential building management system, smart facial recognition system, smart retail engagement system, and smart access control AI system. In addition, it provides contract technical and testing services; sales marketing support services; and information software processing services. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: 533 Zhongzheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 231
